response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This product holds immense value for me, but I understand its true worth lies in finding the right person who can appreciate it fully. Given its significance, I'm offering it to you at a special price of $11,000. This is an opportunity to secure a piece that could potentially be worth even more to you, considering its value to you is estimated at $12,000. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details with you.", "product_price": 11000}
